languages.text: "Грязь и мерзость, в каждом из них". {n}Священник в черном осуждающе качает головой.{/n} "Я — преподобный отец Иеронимус Скорбный, глава миссии друзианцев на Футфоле. А ты больно поспеш{mf|ен|на} в суждениях и горишь яростью. Праведной, возможно, но пустой и тщеславной. Приходи ко мне, когда найдется время — поговорим".

traits.locale_text: "Грязь и мерзость, в каждом из них". {n} Священник в черном осуждающе качает головой.{/n} "Я — преподобный отец Иеронимус Скорбный, глава миссии друзианцев на Футфоле. А ты больно поспеш{mf|ен|на} в суждениях и горишь яростью. Праведной, возможно, но пустой и тщеславной. Приходи ко мне, когда найдется время — поговорим".

languages.text: "Filth and vileness in each and every one of them." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the Drusian mission here on Footfall. And you are far too hasty in your judgements, and ablaze with fury. Righteous fury, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."
languages.original_text: "Грязь и мерзость, в каждом из них". {n}Священник в черном осуждающе качает головой.{/n} "Я — преподобный отец Иеронимус Скорбный, глава миссии друзианцев на Футфоле. А ты больно поспеш{mf|ен|на} в суждениях и горишь яростью. Праведной, возможно, но пустой и тщеславной. Приходи ко мне, когда найдется время — поговорим".

traits.locale_text: "Filth and vileness in each and every one of them." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n} "I am Father Hieronimus Doloroso, head of the Drusian mission here on Footfall. And you are far too hasty in your judgments, and ablaze with rage. A righteous one, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

And you are far too hasty in your judgments, and ablaze with rage. A righteous one, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

And you are far too hasty in your judgments, and ablaze with fury. Righteous fury, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

And you are far too hasty in your judgments, and ablaze with fury. Righteous fury, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

And you are far too hasty in your judgements, and ablaze with fury. Righteous fury, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

languages.text: 「一人残らず底なしに下品で邪悪な者たちばかりだ」{n}司祭は残念そうに首を横に振った。{/n}「私はヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭、ここフットフォールのドルスス派伝道団体の長です。あなたは怒りに燃えるあまり、性急に判断を下している。正義の怒りかもしれないが、中身もなく虚しい。お時間がある際に、私に会いに来てください――詳しいことはその時にお話ししましょう」
languages.original_text: "Filth and vileness in each and every one of them." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the Drusian mission here on Footfall. And you are far too hasty in your judgements, and ablaze with fury. Righteous fury, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: 「一人残らず底なしに下品で邪悪な者たちばかりだ」{n}司祭は残念そうに首を横に振った。{/n}「私はヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭、ここフットフォールのドルスス派伝道団体の長です。あなたは怒りに燃えるあまり、性急に判断を下している。正義の怒りかもしれないが、中身もなく虚しい。お時間がある際に、私に会いに来てください――詳しいことはその時にお話ししましょう」

languages.text: “他们每个人都充斥着污秽与邪恶。”{n}牧师不赞同地摇了摇头，{/n}“我是希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师，是落脚港德鲁苏斯布道所的负责人。你的审判过于急躁，充满怒火。或许这是正义的怒火，但你的怒火却空洞无物。等你有空的时候，来见我一面吧，我们到时再谈。”
languages.original_text: "Filth and vileness in each and every one of them." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the Drusian mission here on Footfall. And you are far too hasty in your judgements, and ablaze with fury. Righteous fury, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: “他们每个人都充斥着污秽与邪恶。”{n}牧师不赞同地摇了摇头，{/n}“我是希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师，是落脚港德鲁苏斯布道所的负责人。你的审判过于急躁，充满怒火。或许这是正义的怒火，但你的怒火却空洞无物。等你有空的时候，来见我一面吧，我们到时再谈。”

languages.text: «Todos ellos albergan inmundicia y ruindad en su ser». {n}El sacerdote sacude la cabeza con desaprobación.{/n} «Soy el reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso, responsable de la misión drusiana de Paso. Se precipita usted en sus juicios, seguramente a razón de una furia justa, pero también vacua y banal. Venga a verme cuando tenga tiempo y hablaremos tranquilamente».
languages.original_text: "Filth and vileness in each and every one of them." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the Drusian mission here on Footfall. And you are far too hasty in your judgements, and ablaze with fury. Righteous fury, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: «Todos ellos albergan inmundicia y ruindad en su ser». {n}El sacerdote sacude la cabeza con desaprobación.{/n} «Soy el reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso, responsable de la misión drusiana de Paso. Se precipita usted en sus juicios, seguramente a razón de una furia justa, pero también vacua y banal. Venga a verme cuando tenga tiempo y hablaremos tranquilamente».

languages.text: « Votre vilenie n'a d'égale que votre bêtise crasse, tous autant que vous êtes ! » {n}Le prêtre secoue la tête d'un air désapprobateur.{/n} « Je suis le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso, chef de la mission drusienne de Castel. Vous laissez votre colère vous pousser à rendre un jugement bien trop hâtif. Cette colère est peut-être justifiée, mais elle reste futile et stérile. Passez me voir quand vous en aurez le temps, nous discuterons à ce moment-là. »
languages.original_text: "Filth and vileness in each and every one of them." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the Drusian mission here on Footfall. And you are far too hasty in your judgements, and ablaze with fury. Righteous fury, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: « Votre vilenie n'a d'égale que votre bêtise crasse, tous autant que vous êtes ! » {n}Le prêtre secoue la tête d'un air désapprobateur.{/n} « Je suis le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso, chef de la mission drusienne de Castel. Vous laissez votre colère vous pousser à rendre un jugement bien trop hâtif. Cette colère est peut-être justifiée, mais elle reste futile et stérile. Passez me voir quand vous en aurez le temps, nous discuterons à ce moment-là. »

languages.text: "Verkommenheit und Niedertracht in jedem Einzelnen von ihnen." {n}Der Priester schüttelt missbilligend den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, Oberhaupt der Drusianer-Mission hier auf Footfall. Und Ihr seid in Eurem von Zorn geleiteten Urteil viel zu voreilig. Rechtschaffener Zorn vielleicht, aber hohl und vergebens. Besucht mich doch, wenn Ihr Zeit habt – dann können wir reden."
languages.original_text: "Filth and vileness in each and every one of them." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the Drusian mission here on Footfall. And you are far too hasty in your judgements, and ablaze with fury. Righteous fury, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: "Verkommenheit und Niedertracht in jedem Einzelnen von ihnen." {n}Der Priester schüttelt missbilligend den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, Oberhaupt der Drusianer-Mission hier auf Footfall. Und Ihr seid in Eurem von Zorn geleiteten Urteil viel zu voreilig. Rechtschaffener Zorn vielleicht, aber hohl und vergebens. Besucht mich doch, wenn Ihr Zeit habt – dann können wir reden."

languages.text: "Hepsinin içini pislik ve şer kaplamış." {n}Rahip, onaylamaz bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Ben Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso, Binliman'daki Drusus misyonunun önderiyim. Hüküm vermekte çok acelecisin, bir de öfkeyle yanıp tutuşuyorsun. Haklı bir öfkedir belki ama yine de boş ve nafile. Zaman bulduğunda yanıma uğra, biraz sohbet edelim."
languages.original_text: "Filth and vileness in each and every one of them." {n}The priest shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n} "I am Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, head of the Drusian mission here on Footfall. And you are far too hasty in your judgements, and ablaze with fury. Righteous fury, perhaps, but hollow and vain. Come see me when you have the time — we can talk then."

traits.locale_text: "Her birinin içi kirlilik ve kötülükle dolu." {n}Rahip onaylamayan bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Ben Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso, Binliman'daki Drusus misyonunun lideriyim. Hüküm vermekte çok acelecisin ve gereğinden fazla öfkelisin. Haklı bir öfke belki de ama yine de boş ve nafile. Zaman bulduğunda yanıma uğra, biraz sohbet edelim."
